My previous experience with credit card accounts is through Discover, and Discover‚Äôs app is better in every way. Capital One‚Äôs mobile app is also more intuitive, user friendly, and visually appealing than this app.

I do like the new 3% cash back in category of your choice deal. I haven‚Äôt had my first statement, though, so the app and website won‚Äôt let me see what cash back rewards are available. Not sure why they are hiding this. 

I have one credit card with Bank of America, just opened recently. I haven‚Äôt used the checking/savings options of the app.
